HotelRoom.RoomTypeName: Basic Studio,1 King Bed And 1 Double Sofa Bed,Nonsmoking

RoomAdditionalInfo.Description:
495 sq feet


Internet - Free WiFi

Entertainment - Flat-screen TV with cable channels

Food and Drink - Kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, cookware/dishware, and electric kettle

Bathroom - Private bathroom, bathtub or shower, bathrobes, and free toiletries

Practical - Safe, free newspaper, and iron/ironing board; free cribs/infant beds available on request

Comfort - Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping

Accessibility - Grab bar in bathtub, raised toilet seat, braille signage, low-height counter and sink, bathroom emergency pull cord, and wheelchair accessible

Non-Smoking
